name: Spring Cleaning (Vhite Rabbit)
description:
SpringCleaning is a VR game in which you do spring cleaning with a bouncy spring.

We originally developed this game in three days for the Spring #UE4jam and are in the process of cleaning it up (hah!).
As a result the current version is more a demo of the main game mechanics than an actual full game!

Have fun playing around with it and let us know if you find any bugs! :)
